textTemplates.name: interviewEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, the status of the following case {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to 'Information missing'. Please check the reason from case approval recent rejection comments and take action accordingly.


Warm Regards,

System Admin.

textTemplates.name: interviewEmailSubject
textTemplates.text: Case {!$Record.CaseNumber} has missing information!
